@graph.caption: General Tso's tempeh served on a white plate with rice

@graph.name: General Tso's Tempeh. vegan glutenfree - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This non fried version of General Tso's Tempheh is vegan and gluten free. Satisfy your takeaway cravings with this easy recipe

@graph.name: General Tso's Tempeh
@graph.description: My General Tso's Tempeh recipe is sure to satisfy your takeaway cravings!
recipeIngredient: 1 Tablespoon orange juice (I used freshly squeezed Satsuma juice)
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes  (or Sriracha to taste)
2-3 teaspoons vegan hoisin sauce to taste (I used just about 2 tsp)
1 Tablespoon cornstarch mixed in 1/3 to 1/2 cup of water (depending on your preference of quantity and consistency of sauce.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep medium pan, add the tempeh, water, soy sauce, orange juice, ginger powder, garlic powder and sugar
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep medium pan, add the tempeh, water, soy sauce, orange juice, ginger powder, garlic powder and sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and cook covered on low heat, until all liquid is absorbed(12-15 minutes).You can also marinate the tempeh in the mix for half an hour before cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and cook covered on low heat, until all liquid is absorbed(12-15 minutes).You can also marinate the tempeh in the mix for half an hour before cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: In another medium pan, add 1 teaspoon of oil and heat on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In another medium pan, add 1 teaspoon of oil and heat on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked tempeh and cook on medium heat for 2 minutes until some sides are brown/crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked tempeh and cook on medium heat for 2 minutes until some sides are brown/crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic cloves, ginger and cook for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic cloves, ginger and cook for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the following; soy sauce, sugar, orange juice, chilli flakes, white wine, sherry, hoisin, sesame oil and cornstarch
recipeInstructions.name: Add the following; soy sauce, sugar, orange juice, chilli flakes, white wine, sherry, hoisin, sesame oil and cornstarch

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well to coat and cook on low-medium heat until the sauce thickens(5-7 minutes). Adjust spice and Sauces if needed to taste.(depends on the sauce brands, each has different flavor depth)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well to coat and cook on low-medium heat until the sauce thickens(5-7 minutes). Adjust spice and Sauces if needed to taste.(depends on the sauce brands, each has different flavor depth)

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with a cup of white or brown rice, topped with chopped green onions/scallions and a slice of mandarin orange.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with a cup of white or brown rice, topped with chopped green onions/scallions and a slice of mandarin orange.
